body_html: I added a test case for endianness. By the way, according to the documentation (https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/api_docs/python/tf/decode_raw), I think this op should behave consistently on platforms with different endianness, so I removed the endianness test in an existing test case. If the original behavior in that test case is expected, maybe you should make changes on the documentation.

By the way, according to the documentation (https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/api_docs/python/tf/decode_raw), I think this op should behave consistently on platforms with different endianness, so I removed the endianness test in an existing test case.
